# Test Mermaid Diagrams

This file contains various types of Mermaid diagrams to test the extension functionality.

## Flowchart
```mermaid

```

## Sequence Diagram
```mermaid

```

## Class Diagram
```mermaid
classDiagram
    class MermaidExtension {
        +activate()
        +openPreview()
        +zoomIn()
        +zoomOut()
        +resetZoom()
    }
    
    class WebviewPanel {
        +postMessage()
        +onDidReceiveMessage()
        +reveal()
    }
    
    class DiagramRenderer {
        +renderMermaid()
        +updateDiagram()
    }
    
    MermaidExtension --> WebviewPanel
    MermaidExtension --> DiagramRenderer
```

## Git Graph
```mermaid
gitgraph
    commit id: "Initial commit"
    branch develop
    checkout develop
    commit id: "Add mermaid support"
    commit id: "Add zoom features"
    checkout main
    merge develop
    commit id: "Release v1.0"
    branch feature/live-preview
    checkout feature/live-preview
    commit id: "Implement live preview"
    checkout main
    merge feature/live-preview
    commit id: "Release v1.1"
```

## State Diagram
```mermaid
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Inactive
    Inactive --> Active: Activate Extension
    Active --> Previewing: Open Preview
    Previewing --> Active: Close Preview
    Previewing --> Zooming: Zoom In/Out
    Zooming --> Previewing: Reset Zoom
    Active --> Inactive: Deactivate
    Inactive --> [*]
```

journey
